page.title: 13A day in the life of ...
page.content: On my way to school I see many people. Half of my journey is along a peaceful country road, while the remainder is along a busy dual-carriageway,the A 217. At school it is always the same routine: 2 lessons, break, 3rd lesson, lunch,4th lesson and finally de-registration. Then once again I take my journey back home. When I arrive home,I start my homework. This can sometimes take up to one and a half hours. After my homework I get changed and go out for a while. I usually practise golf, but occasionally play football. At around nine o'clock I come in and at around ten o'clock I go to bed.
